02293     int mm_offset = L-1;
02294     int a_stride = 2*L-1;
02295     int b_stride = L;
02296     int bext_stride = 2*L-1;
02297     int g_stride = 2*N-1;
02298 
02299     int n_start, n_stop, n_inc;
02300 
02301     switch (n_mode)
02302     {
02303     case SO3_N_MODE_ALL:
02304     case SO3_N_MODE_L:
02305         n_start = 0;
02306         n_stop  = N-1;
02307         n_inc = 1;
02308         break;
02309     case SO3_N_MODE_EVEN:
02310         n_start = 0;
02311         n_stop  = ((N-1) % 2 == 0) ?  N-1 :  N-2;
02312         n_inc = 2;
02313         break;
02314     case SO3_N_MODE_ODD:
02315         n_start = 1;
02316         n_stop  = ((N-1) % 2 != 0) ?  N-1 :  N-2;
02317         n_inc = 2;
02318         break;
02319     case SO3_N_MODE_MAXIMUM:
02320         n_start = N-1;
02321         n_stop  = N-1;
02322         n_inc = 1;
02323         break;
02324     default:
02325         SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid n-mode.");
02326     }
02327 
02328     double *sqrt_tbl = calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(*sqrt_tbl));
02329     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl);
02330     double *signs = calloc(L+1, sizeof(*signs));
02331     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs);
02332     complex double *exps = calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(*exps));
02333     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(exps);
02334     complex double *expsmm = calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(*expsmm));
02335     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(expsmm);
02336 
02337     int el, m, n, mm; // mm is for m'
02338     // Perform precomputations.
02339     for (el = 0; el <= 2*(L-1)+1; ++el)
02340         sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
02341     for (m = 0; m <= L-1; m += 2)
02342     {
02343         signs[m]   =  1.0;
02344         signs[m+1] = -1.0;
02345     }
02346     int i;
02347     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
02348         exps[i] = cexp(I*SO3_PION2*i);
02349     for (mm = -L+1; mm <= L-1; ++mm)
02350         expsmm[mm + mm_offset] = cexp(-I*mm*SSHT_PI/(2.0*L-1.0));
02351 
02352     double norm_factor = 1.0/(2.0*L-1.0)/(2.0*N-1.0);
02353 
02354     // Compute Fourier transform over alpha and gamma, i.e. compute Fmn(b).
02355     complex double *Fmnb = calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1)*N, sizeof(*Fmnb));
02356     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmnb);
02357     double *fft_in = calloc((2*L-1)*(2*N-1), sizeof(*fft_in));
02358     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(fft_in);
02359     complex double *fft_out = calloc((2*L-1)*N, sizeof(*fft_out));
02360     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(fft_out);
02361     // Redundant dimension needs to be last
02362     fftw_plan plan = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_2d(
02363                         2*L-1, 2*N-1,
02364                         fft_in, fft_out,
02365                         FFTW_ESTIMATE);
02366 
02367     int a, b, g;
02368     for (b = 0; b < L; ++b)
02369     {
02370         // TODO: This loop could probably be avoided by using
02371         // a more elaborate FFTW plan which performs the FFT directly
02372         // over the 1st and 3rd dimensions of f.
02373         // Instead, for each index in the 2nd dimension, we copy the
02374         // corresponding values in the 1st and 3rd dimension into a
02375         // new 2D array, to perform a standard 2D FFT there. While
02376         // we're at it, we also reshape that array such that gamma
02377         // is the inner dimension, as required by FFTW.
02378         for (a = 0; a < 2*L-1; ++a)
02379             for (g = 0; g < 2*N-1; ++g)
02380                 fft_in[g + g_stride*(
02381                        a)] =
02382                     f[a + a_stride*(
02383                       b + b_stride*(
02384                       g))];
02385 
02386         fftw_execute(plan);
02387 
02388         // Apply spatial shift and normalisation factor, while
02389         // reshaping the dimensions once more.
02390         for (n = n_start; n <= n_stop; n += n_inc)
02391         {
02392             for (m = -L+1; m <= L-1; ++m)
02393             {
02394                 int m_shift = m < 0 ? 2*L-1 : 0;
02395                 Fmnb[b + bext_stride*(
02396                      m + m_offset + m_stride*(
02397                      n + n_offset))] =
02398                     fft_out[n + n_stride*(
02399                             m + m_shift)] * norm_factor;
02400             }
02401         }
02402     }
02403     fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
02404 
02405     // Extend Fmnb periodically.
02406     for (n = n_start; n <= n_stop; n += n_inc)
02407         for (m = -L+1; m <= L-1; ++m)
02408         {
02409             int signmn = signs[abs(m+n)%2];
02410             for (b = L; b < 2*L-1; ++b)
02411                 Fmnb[b + bext_stride*(
02412                      m + m_offset + m_stride*(
02413                      n + n_offset))] =
02414                     signmn
02415                     * Fmnb[(2*L-2-b) + bext_stride*(
02416                            m + m_offset + m_stride*(
02417                            n + n_offset))];
02418         }
02419 
02420 
02421     // Compute Fourier transform over beta, i.e. compute Fmnm'.
02422     complex double *Fmnm = calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1)*(2*N-1), sizeof(*Fmnm));
02423     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmnm);
02424     complex double *inout = calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(*inout));
02425     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout);
02426     
02427     plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(
02428             2*L-1,
02429             inout, inout, 
02430             FFTW_FORWARD, 
02431             FFTW_ESTIMATE);
02432     for (n = n_start; n <= n_stop; n += n_inc)
02433         for (m = -L+1; m <= L-1; ++m)
02434         {
02435             memcpy(inout, 
02436                    Fmnb + 0 + bext_stride*(
02437                           m + m_offset + m_stride*(
02438                           n + n_offset)), 
02439                    bext_stride*sizeof(*Fmnb));
02440             fftw_execute(plan);
02441 
02442             // Apply spatial shift and normalisation factor
02443             for (mm = -L+1; mm <= L-1; ++mm)
02444             {
02445                 int mm_shift = mm < 0 ? 2*L-1 : 0;
02446                 Fmnm[mm + mm_offset + mm_stride*(
02447                      m + m_offset + m_stride*(
02448                      n + n_offset))] =
02449                     inout[mm + mm_shift] / (2.0*L-1.0);
02450             }
02451         }
02452     fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
02453     free(inout);
02454 
02455     // Apply phase modulation to account for sampling offset.
02456     for (n = n_start; n <= n_stop; n += n_inc)
02457         for (m = -L+1; m <= L-1; ++m)
02458             for (mm = -L+1; mm <= L-1; ++mm)
02459                 Fmnm[mm + mm_offset + mm_stride*(
02460                      m + m_offset + m_stride*(
02461                      n + n_offset))] *=
02462                     expsmm[mm + mm_offset];
02463 
02464     // Compute weights.
02465     complex double *w = calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(*w));
02466     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(w);
02467     int w_offset = 2*(L-1);
02468     for (mm = -2*(L-1); mm <= 2*(L-1); ++mm)
02469         w[mm+w_offset] = so3_sampling_weight(parameters, mm);
02470 
02471     // Compute IFFT of w to give wr.
02472     complex double *wr = calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(*w));
02473     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(wr);
02474     inout = calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(*inout));
02475     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout);
02476     fftw_plan plan_bwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(
02477                             4*L-3, 
02478                             inout, inout, 
02479                             FFTW_BACKWARD, 
02480                             FFTW_MEASURE);
02481     fftw_plan plan_fwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(
02482                             4*L-3, 
02483                             inout, 
02484                             inout, 
02485                             FFTW_FORWARD, 
02486                             FFTW_MEASURE);
02487 
02488     // Apply spatial shift.
02489     for (mm = 1; mm <= 2*L-2; ++mm)
02490         inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
02491     for (mm = -2*(L-1); mm <= 0; ++mm)
02492         inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02493 
02494     fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
02495 
02496     // Apply spatial shift.
02497     for (mm = 0; mm <= 2*L-2; ++mm)
02498         wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02499     for (mm = -2*(L-1); mm <= -1; ++mm)
02500         wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
02501 
02502     // Compute Gmnm' by convolution implemented as product in real space.
02503     complex double *Fmnm_pad = calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(*Fmnm_pad));
02504     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmnm_pad);
02505     complex double *Gmnm = calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1)*N, sizeof(*Gmnm));
02506     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Gmnm);
02507     for (n = n_start; n <= n_stop; n += n_inc)
02508         for (m = -L+1; m <= L-1; ++m)
02509         {
02510 
02511             // Zero-pad Fmnm'.
02512             for (mm = -2*(L-1); mm <= -L; ++mm)
02513                 Fmnm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
02514             for (mm = L; mm <= 2*(L-1); ++mm)
02515                 Fmnm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
02516             for (mm = -(L-1); mm <= L-1; ++mm)
02517                 Fmnm_pad[mm + w_offset] =
02518                     Fmnm[mm + mm_offset + mm_stride*(
02519                          m + m_offset + m_stride*(
02520                          n + n_offset))];
02521         
02522             // Apply spatial shift.
02523             for (mm = 1; mm <= 2*L-2; ++mm)
02524                 inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmnm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
02525             for (mm = -2*(L-1); mm <= 0; ++mm)
02526                 inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmnm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02527             // Compute IFFT of Fmnm'.
02528             fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
02529             // Apply spatial shift.
02530             for (mm = 0; mm <= 2*L-2; ++mm)
02531                 Fmnm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02532             for (mm = -2*(L-1); mm <= -1; ++mm)
02533                 Fmnm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
02534         
02535             // Compute product of Fmnm' and weight in real space.
02536             int r;
02537             for (r = -2*(L-1); r <= 2*(L-1); ++r)
02538                 Fmnm_pad[r + w_offset] *= wr[r + w_offset];
02539         
02540             // Apply spatial shift.
02541             for (mm = 1; mm <= 2*L-2; ++mm)
02542                 inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmnm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
02543             for (mm = -2*(L-1); mm <= 0; ++mm)
02544                 inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmnm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02545             // Compute Gmnm' by FFT.
02546             fftw_execute_dft(plan_fwd, inout, inout);
02547             // Apply spatial shift.
02548             for (mm = 0; mm <= 2*L-2; ++mm)
02549                 Fmnm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02550             for (mm = -2*(L-1); mm <= -1; ++mm)
02551                 Fmnm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
02552         
02553             // Extract section of Gmnm' of interest.
02554             for (mm = -(L-1); mm <= L-1; ++mm)
02555                 Gmnm[m + m_offset + m_stride*(
02556                      mm + mm_offset + mm_stride*(
02557                      n + n_offset))] =
02558                     Fmnm_pad[mm + w_offset] 
02559                     * 4.0 * SSHT_PI * SSHT_PI / (4.0*L-3.0);
02560         
02561         }
02562     fftw_destroy_plan(plan_bwd);
02563     fftw_destroy_plan(plan_fwd);
02564 
02565     // Compute flmn.
02566     double *dl, *dl8 = NULL;
02567     dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
02568     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl);
02569     if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
02570     {
02571         dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
02572         SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8);
02573     }
02574     int dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
02575     int dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
02576     for (n = 0; n <= N-1; ++n)
02577         for (el = n; el < L; ++el)
02578             for (m = -el; m <= el; ++m)
02579             {
02580                 int ind;
02581                 so3_sampling_elmn2ind_real(&ind, el, m, n, parameters);
02582                 flmn[ind] = 0.0;
02583             }
02584 
02585     for (el = L0; el < L; ++el)
02586     {
02587         int eltmp;
02588 
02589         // Compute Wigner plane.
02590         switch (dl_method)
02591         {
02592         case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
02593             if (el != 0 && el == L0)
02594             {
02595                 for(eltmp = 0; eltmp <= L0; ++eltmp)
02596                     ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SO3_PION2, L,
02597                         SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02598                         eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
02599                 ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl,
02600                     dl8, L,
02601                     SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02602                     SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02603                     el,
02604                     signs);
02605             }
02606             else
02607             {
02608                 ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SO3_PION2, L,
02609                     SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02610                     el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
02611                 ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl,
02612                     dl8, L,
02613                     SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02614                     SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02615                     el,
02616                     signs);
02617             }
02618             break;
02619 
02620         case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
02621             if (el != 0 && el == L0)
02622             {
02623                 for(eltmp = 0; eltmp <= L0; ++eltmp)
02624                     ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
02625                         SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02626                         eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
02627                 ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
02628                     SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02629                     el, signs);
02630             }
02631             else
02632             {
02633                 ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
02634                     SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02635                     el, sqrt_tbl);
02636                 ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
02637                     SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02638                     el, signs);
02639             }
02640             break;
02641 
02642         default:
02643             SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method");
02644         }
02645 
02646         // Compute flmn for current el.
02647 
02648 
02649         switch (n_mode)
02650         {
02651         case SO3_N_MODE_ALL:
02652             n_start = 0;
02653             n_stop  = MIN( N-1, el);
02654             n_inc = 1;
02655             break;
02656         case SO3_N_MODE_EVEN:
02657             n_start = 0;
02658             n_stop  = MIN( N-1, el);
02659             n_stop  -=  n_stop%2;
02660             n_inc = 2;
02661             break;
02662         case SO3_N_MODE_ODD:
02663             n_start = 1;
02664             n_stop  = MIN( N-1, el);
02665             n_stop  -= 1-n_stop%2;
02666             n_inc = 2;
02667             break;
02668         case SO3_N_MODE_MAXIMUM:
02669             if (el < N-1)
02670                 continue;
02671             n_start = N-1;
02672             n_stop  = N-1;
02673             n_inc = 1;
02674             break;
02675         case SO3_N_MODE_L:
02676             if (el >= N)
02677                 continue;
02678             n_start = el;
02679             n_stop  = el;
02680             n_inc = 1;
02681             break;
02682         default:
02683             SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid n-mode.");
02684         }
02685     
02686         // TODO: Pull out a few multiplications into precomputations
02687         // or split up loops to avoid conditionals to check signs.
02688         for (mm = -el; mm <= el; ++mm)
02689         {
02690             // These signs are needed for the symmetry relations of
02691             // Wigner symbols.
02692             double elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[abs(mm)];
02693 
02694             for (n = n_start; n <= n_stop; n += n_inc)
02695             {
02696                 double mmsign = mm >= 0 ? 1.0 : signs[el] * signs[n];
02697                  
02698                 // Factor which does not depend on m.
02699                 double elnmm_factor = mmsign
02700                                       * dl[n + dl_offset + abs(mm)*dl_stride];
02701                 
02702                 for (m = -el; m <= el; ++m)
02703                 {
02704                     mmsign = mm >= 0 ? 1.0 : signs[el] * signs[abs(m)];
02705                     double elmsign = m >= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
02706                     int ind;
02707                     so3_sampling_elmn2ind_real(&ind, el, m, n, parameters);
02708                     int mod = ((m-n)%4 + 4)%4;
02709                     flmn[ind] += 
02710                         exps[mod]
02711                         * elnmm_factor
02712                         * mmsign * elmsign
02713                         * dl[abs(m) + dl_offset + abs(mm)*dl_stride]
02714                         * Gmnm[m + m_offset + m_stride*(
02715                                mm + mm_offset + mm_stride*(
02716                                n + n_offset))];
02717 
02718                 }
02719             }
02720         }
02721     }
02722 
02723     free(dl);
02724     if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
02725         free(dl8);
02726     free(Fmnb);
02727     free(Fmnm);
02728     free(inout);
02729     free(w);
02730     free(wr);
02731     free(Fmnm_pad);
02732     free(Gmnm);
02733     free(sqrt_tbl);
02734     free(signs);
02735     free(exps);
02736     free(expsmm);
02737 
02738     if (verbosity > 0)
02739         printf("%sForward transform computed!\n", SO3_PROMPT);
02740 }
Generated on 10 Nov 2016 by  1.6.1
